page.title: 07WAVERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: School starts at 8.55 and finishes at 3.30pm. Most of the children live close by aand walk to school. There are 6 classes each with 30 children and the work we do is suited to the age and ability of each child across all areas of the curriculum. The school staff consists of Headteacher and 6 class teachers, caretaker, cook, secetary and classroom assistant.Each day starts with assembly in the hall. We work in our classes with a school break at 10.30. We have a cafeteria system for lunch at 12.00 and then we play games in the playground or on the school field. Afternoon school is from 1.00 to 3.00 Infants and 3.30 for juniors. After school we have school clubs. Rounders,Cricket,Netball, Football, Gymnastics,Guitar or Country Dance.Sometimes we play team games against other schools in the district.
